mapper.insert: insert into members(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_gender, me_nickname, me_tel, me_mail) values(#{user.me_id},#{user.me_pw},#{user.me_name},#{user.me_gender},#{user.me_nickname},#{user.me_tel}, #{user.me_mail})
mapper.select: select * from members where me_id like #{pl_me_id}
